itemLabel: John Douglas-Scott-Montagu, 2nd Baron Montagu of Beaulieu

wikipedia_page.main: John Walter Edward Douglas-Scott-Montagu, 2nd Baron Montagu of Beaulieu  (10 June 1866 – 30 March 1929), was a British Conservative politician and promoter of motoring.  He is the father of Edward Douglas-Scott-Montagu, 3rd Baron Montagu of Beaulieu who would go on to found the National Motor Museum, Beaulieu in Montagu's memory.
